snippet.title: Hammerwatch 2 - Official Developer Gameplay Overview Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2023 Showcase
snippet.description:
Join the creative director from the development team at Crackshell for a deep dive into Hammerwatch 2, including a discussion on how this upcoming sequel differs from Hammerwatch and the new features you can expect. Hammerwatch 2 is an upcoming roguelike, open-ended action-adventure game, featuring expanded classes with active and passive skills, and much more. Hammerwatch 2 will be available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#GameTrailers #SoG
